# Invalid FIX messages that should raise errors
# Format: message|expected_error_type|expected_error_contains

# Missing OrderID (tag 37)
55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXMissingFieldError|OrderID

# Missing Symbol (tag 55)
37=ORD|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXMissingFieldError|Symbol

# Missing Side (tag 54)
37=ORD|55=AAPL|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXMissingFieldError|Side

# Missing Quantity (tag 32)
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXMissingFieldError|LastQty

# Missing Price (tag 31)
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXMissingFieldError|LastPx

# Missing Timestamp (tag 60)
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|FIXMissingFieldError|TransactTime

# Invalid Side value
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=3|32=100|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXValidationError|Side

# Non-numeric quantity
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=abc|31=150|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXValidationError|LastQty

# Non-numeric price
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=xyz|60=20240115-10:00:00|FIXValidationError|LastPx

# Invalid timestamp format
37=ORD|55=AAPL|54=1|32=100|31=150|60=invalid-time|FIXValidationError|TransactTime

# Empty message
|FIXParseError|empty

# Whitespace only message
   |FIXParseError|empty
